tuv.seg: The Court Registrar usually sits on a slightly raised platform below the judge facing the court
Bíonn Cláraitheoir na Cúirte ina shuí/ina suí go hiondúil ar ardán ardaithe beagán faoin mbreitheamh, os comhair na cúirte
They do not wear any special clothes in court, although sometimes in the High Court if the Registrar happens to also be a barrister, they will wear barrister's robes
Ní chaitheann sé nó sí aon éadach speisialta sa chúirt, ach uaireanta san Ard Chúirt más abhcóide chomh maith an Cláraitheoir caithfidh sé nó sí róbaí abhcóide
Court Registrars are public servants and they are recruited directly from the civil service
Seirbhísigh poiblí is ea iad Cláraitheoirí Cúirte agus earcaítear iad go díreach ón státseirbhís
The Registrar's main function is to assist the judge:
Is í príomhfheidhm an Chláraitheora cúnamh a thabhairt don bhreitheamh:
• The Registrar has a list of all the cases before the court for the day
• Tá liosta de cásanna go léir na cúirte don lá ag an gCláraitheoir
They call out each case in turn so that the parties can identify themselves to the court
Fograíonn sé nó sí gach cás ionas go mbeidh na páirtithe in ann iad féin a chur in iúl don chúirt
• When a witness is called in a case, it is the Registrar who hands the witness the Bible and reads out the oath for the witness to repeat
• Nuair a ghlaoitear finné i gcás, is é an Cláraitheoir a thugann an Bíobla don fhinné agus a léann amach an mionn a chaitheann an finné a athrá
• The Registrar keeps the court documents (writs, etc.) for each case and hands them to the judge as each case is called
• Coinníonn an Cláraitheoir doiciméid na cúirte (eascairí, etc.) do gach cás agus tugann don bhreitheamh iad nuair a fhógraítear gach cás
• When the court makes an order, the Registrar keeps a note of the order
• Nuair a dhéanann cúirt ordú, coinníonn an Cláraitheoir nóta den ordú
• After the day in court, the Registrar drafts the orders that the judge has made that day and keeps a record of those orders
• Tar éis lá sa chúirt déanann an Cláraitheoir na horduithe a rinne an breitheamh an lá sin a dhréachtú agus coinníonn sé taifead de na horduithe sin
• The Registrar generally deals with the administration necessary for the smooth running of the courts
• Pléann an Cláraitheoir leis an riarachán is gá le go mbeidh na cúirteanna in ann feidhmiú gan tuisliú
